Novel Baswedan: Presiden Mau Bicara Apa Lagi?
01 Nov 2019, 04:10 by Fikri Arigi, Amirullah
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Penyidik Komisi Pemberantasan Korupsi Novel Baswedan mengatakan sudah memprediksi kegagalan Polri mengungkap kasus penyiraman air keras terhadap dirinya. Novel kembali menyebut pentingnya pembentukan Tim Gabungan Pencari Fakta (TGPF).
"Ini sudah seperti yang saya prediksi empat bulan setelah kejadian. Saya bilang memang tidak akan bisa terungkap, makanya perlu bikin TGPF," kata Novel saat dihubungi Tempo, Jumat, 1 November 2019.
Ia menyayangkan sikap Presiden Jokowi yang justru bersikap sebaliknya, yakni menunggu hasil tim teknis Polri. Namun, kata Novel, kasus sudah lewat dua tahun lebih dan masih belum ada kabar tertangkapnya pelaku.
"Sekarang ini sudah sekian lama. Presiden mau bicara apa lagi beliau?" tuturnya.
Tim teknis Polri yang dibentuk pada 1 Agustus lalu seharusnya telah menyelesaikan tugasnya kemarin 31 Oktober 2019. Tapi sampai berakhirnya waktu tiga bulan yang diberikan Jokowi, kepolisian tak juga mampu mengungkap pelaku teror Novel.
Tim teknis ini bekerja untuk menindaklanjuti temuan tim gabungan Polri yang dibentuk pada Januari lalu. Hasil kerja tim gabungan ini adalah menemukan tiga orang yang patut dicurigai terlibat kasus teror Novel.
Novel pun menilai Polri berani tak melaksanakan perintah presiden. Karena ini merupakan perintah Jokowi yang ketiga, namun hasilnya masih belum nampak. "Saya pikir kalau presiden saja perintahnya tidak dilaksanakan, lalu siapa lagi yang mau didengar perintahnya," kata dia.

Baswedan's novel: What does the president want to talk about?
01 Nov 2019, 04:10 by Fikri Arigi, Amirullah
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Corruption Eradication Commission (KPK) investigator Novel Baswedan said he had predicted the failure of the Indonesian National Police to reveal his case of hard watering. The novel again mentions the importance of forming a Joint Fact-Finding Team (TGPF).
"This is what I predicted four months after the incident. I said that it would not be revealed, so it was necessary to make TGPF," Novel said when contacted by Tempo, Friday, November 1, 2019.
He regretted the attitude of President Jokowi who actually acted the opposite, namely waiting for the results of the National Police technical team. However, Novel said, the case has passed more than two years and there is still no news of the arrest of the perpetrators.
"It's been a long time. What do you want to talk about, President?" he said.
The Polri technical team formed on 1 August should have completed its task yesterday 31 October 2019. But until the end of the three month period given by Jokowi, the police were also unable to uncover the perpetrators of the Novel terror.
This technical team is working to follow up on the findings of the joint National Police team formed in January. The results of the joint team's work was to find three people who should be suspected of being involved in the Novel terror case.
The novel also assesses that the National Police dare not carry out the president's order. Because this is Jokowi's third command, but the results are still not visible. "I think if the president's orders were not carried out, then who else would want to be heard," he said.
